amendatorysection.para: In addition to the tax imposed pursuant to sections 66-6,108, 66-6,109, and 66-6,109.02, an excise tax of seven and one-half cents per gallon or gallon equivalent is levied and imposed on all compressed fuel sold for use in registered motor vehicles. The changes made to this section by Laws 2008, LB 846, apply for tax periods beginning on and after July 1, 2009.
